changeSet.author: renhongyu
changeSet.sql: alter table LOTTERY_CHASE modify ID VARCHAR2(50);

changeSet.author: fengqinyun
changeSet.sql: alter table lottery_order add(content clob) ;

changeSet.author: fengqinyun
changeSet.sql: alter table ticket modify(peilv varchar2(4000)) ;

changeSet.author: renhongyu
renhongyu
changeSet.sql:
create table user_achievement ( id NUMBER(20) not null, userno VARCHAR2(255) not null, lottype NUMBER(10) not null, effectiveAchievement NUMBER(20) not null, ineffectiveAchievement NUMBER(20) not null, updateTime TIMESTAMP(6) default to_timestamp('2013-01-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') not null ); alter table user_achievement add constraint achievement_pk primary key (id);
create table user_achievement_detail ( id NUMBER(20) not null, userno VARCHAR2(255) not null, lottype NUMBER(10) not null, achievement NUMBER(10) not null, achievementType NUMBER(1) not null, caselotId VARCHAR2(255) not null, createTime TIMESTAMP(6) default to_timestamp('2013-01-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') not null ); alter table user_achievement_detail add constraint achievement_detail_pk primary key (id);

changeSet.author: renhongyu
changeSet.sql:
create table AUTO_JOIN ( id NUMBER(20) not null, userno VARCHAR2(255) not null, lottype NUMBER(10) not null, starter VARCHAR2(255) not null, times NUMBER(3) not null, joinAmt NUMBER(10) not null, joinTimes NUMBER(3) default 0, failNum NUMBER(3) default 0, createTime TIMESTAMP(6) not null, UPDATETIME TIMESTAMP(6), autoJoinState NUMBER(1) not null, forceJoin NUMBER(1) not null ) ; alter table AUTO_JOIN add constraint AUTOJOIN_pk primary key (ID);
create table AUTO_JOIN_DETAIL ( id NUMBER(20) not null, autoJoinId NUMBER(20) not null, caseLotBuyId VARCHAR2(255), userno VARCHAR2(255) not null, caselotId VARCHAR2(255) not null, joinAmt NUMBER(10) not null, state NUMBER(1) not null, memo VARCHAR2(255) not null, createTime TIMESTAMP(6) not null ) ; alter table AUTO_JOIN_DETAIL add constraint AUTOJOINDETAIL_pk primary key (ID);

changeSet.author: renhongyu
changeSet.sql: alter table AUTO_JOIN_DETAIL add LOTTYPE NUMBER(10);

changeSet.author: liuxiaoyan
changeSet.sql: alter table pay_property modify config_value varchar2(4000);

changeSet.author: fengqinyun
changeSet.sql: alter table terminal_property modify terminal_value varchar2(4000);

changeSet.author: liuxiaoyan
changeSet.sql: alter table lottery_draw_amount add operate_type NUMBER(1) default 1;

changeSet.author: renhongyu
changeSet.sql: alter table LOTTERY_LOGIC_MACHINE modify SWITCH_TIME null; alter table LOTTERY_LOGIC_MACHINE rename column CURRENT_DATE to CURRENTDATE;

changeSet.author: fengqinyun
changeSet.sql: alter table lottery_order modify first_matchnum number(20) default 0;
